name: Consolidate Duplicate Memories
description: Merge memories with overlapping content into higher-confidence unified entries
instructions: Find memories with >80% content similarity. Merge them, keeping the best title and combining unique tags. Set confidence to max of the merged entries.
validation: Verify merged memory count < original count and no data loss in content field

name: Prune Stale Memories
description: Archive or remove memories that haven't been accessed and are outdated
instructions: Identify memories older than 30 days with 0 access count and confidence < 0.3. Mark for archival or deletion.
validation: Verify pruned memories had 0 access and low confidence before removal

name: Extract Pattern from Session
description: Analyze recent work sessions and extract reusable patterns
instructions: Scan recent session logs for repeated problem-solution pairs. Create new 'pattern' type memories with appropriate tags and context.
validation: New patterns should not duplicate existing ones (similarity < 60%)

name: Cross-Project Knowledge Bridge
description: Find applicable knowledge from one project that can benefit another
instructions: Compare memories across projects sharing the same engine. Identify transferable patterns and create bridge memories tagged with both project IDs.
validation: Bridge memories must reference valid projects and have confidence >= 0.4

name: Fix Broken References
description: Detect and repair memories referencing deleted projects or invalid data
instructions: Find memories with project_id not matching any existing project. Either reassign to correct project or mark confidence to 0 for review.
validation: All memory project_ids should resolve to valid projects after repair

name: Boost High-Value Memory Confidence
description: Increase confidence of frequently accessed, validated memories
instructions: Identify memories with access_count > 10 and positive usage signals. Increase confidence by 0.1, capped at 1.0.
validation: Confidence values must remain in [0, 1] range
